definitions.body: deception, disappointment, falsehood ;—´[[שׁ]]: Ex 23:7 + 64 t.; [[שָָׁקֶר]] Ex 5:9 + 42 t.; pl. [[שְׁקָרִים]] Ps 101:7 + 3 t.; sf. [[שִׁקְרֵיהֶם]] Je 23:22;—

deception, what deceives, disappoints, and betrays one : a molten image Je 10:14 = Je 51:17; gift Pr 25:14; grace of person Pr 31:30, etc.; ´[[אׂ֫רַח שׁ]]: Ps 119:104, Ps 119:128; ´[[דֶּ֫רֶח שׁ]]: v:Ps 119:29; ´[[בטח בשׁ]]: Je 13:25; ´[[נחל שׁ]]: Je 16:19, cf. also Ps 7:15, Ps 33:17, Ps 119:118, Is 28:15; [[לַשֶּׁקֶר]] for disappointment, in vain 1Sa 25:21, Je 3:23.

injurious falsehood, in testimony, esp. in courts : [[עַד שֶׁקֶר]] Ex 20:16 (E) De 19:18, Ps 27:12, Pr 6:19, Pr 14:5, Pr 25:18; [[עֵר שׁקרים]] Pr 12:17, Pr 19:5, Pr 19:9; ´[[ענה שׁ]]: De 19:18 testify falsehood; ´[[שְׁבֻעַת שׁ]]: Zc Zec 8:17 false oath; ´[[נשׁבע לשׁ]]: swear falsely Je 5:2 + 5 t.; ´[[נשׁבע על שׁ]]: Le 5:22; ´[[דבּר שׁ]]: Mic 6:12 + (v. [[[דָּבַר]]], [[דָּבָר]]); ´[[אִמְרֵ י שׁ]]: Is 32:7; ´[[שׁ]] :([[י]])[[שׂפת]] Ps 31:19, Ps 120:2, Pr 10:18, Pr 17:7; [[טפל]] ´[[שׁ]]: Job 13:4, Ps 119:69, cf. v:Ps 119:163; abs. false ! 2Ki 9:12, Je 37:14.
